name: Black Flame's Protection
caption:
A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.

The Apostles were all embraced by the Gloam-Eyed Queen, and the black flame was their armor within.
info:
Draw black flame within to harden the body while blunting restorative power.

Increase <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font> by 35% for 70 seconds but reduces all healing by 20%; counts as a body buff that cannot stack with similar effects.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin, Godslayer

name: Bestial Sling
caption:
Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.

It is said that in the time before the Erdtree, stones were the first weapons of the beasts who had gained intelligence.
info:
Unleash a rapid spray of stone shards in a forward cone, firing immediately after other actions to flinch low-<font color="#E0B985">poise</font> foes.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (per shard):</font> 87
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Bestial

name: Furious Blade of Ansbach
caption:
Incantation of Ansbach, Pureblood Knight.

Markedly different from the finessed swordplay of the dynast, this is an aggressive last resort of an incantation that gave rise to Ansbach's fearsome reputation.
info:
Summon a bloodflame blade from the hand and lunge through foes with successive slashes, each applying a stacking Bloodflame bleed; charging attempts a fourth slash, though the extra hit rarely connects due to a known 1.13 bug.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> Incant Scaling x 0.97 per slash; Incant Scaling x 1.54 final flame hit
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> Incant Scaling x 0.98 per slash; Incant Scaling x 1.63 final hit
<font color="#C84343">Base blood loss accumulation:</font> 180 total from 3 hits; 3 per tick, 10 times per second for 2 seconds per hit
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 4 + 4 + 2 (10 total)
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Blood Oath

name: Heal from Afar
caption:
An Erdtree incantation discovered in the realm of shadow.

Even when far beyond, far out of sight, the Erdtree will surely give us its blessing.
info:
Fire a glowing projectile that heals allies on contact and can be aimed at the ground for instant effect, also damaging Wraiths and Revenants while breaking their stance without drawing aggression.

<font color="#E0B985">Self heal:</font> 4.2x Faith scaling HP
<font color="#E0B985">Ally heal:</font> 3.36x Faith scaling HP within 6 meters
<font color="#E0B985">Damage vs Wraiths/Revenants:</font> (0.5% <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font>) + 300
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Ancient Erdtree

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Thorns
caption:
Aspect of the Crucible that manifested in golden hippopotami.

In an age long past, before this land was enshrouded in shadow, the vitality of the Crucible flourished. Remains of this can be seen in the ancient ruins.
info:
Create a bristling mass of thorn-like fur on the caster's back before rolling across the ground to scour the area, dealing pierce damage; charging increases potency and duration.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (per hit):</font> 45 uncharged / 120 charged
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (per hit):</font> 0.6 (five hits when charged)
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Ancient Erdtree

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Bloom
caption:
Aspect of the Crucible discovered in the ancient ruins.

In an age long past, before this land was enshrouded in shadow, the vitality of the Crucible flourished.
info:
Plant a miranda flower on the chest before calling down a rain of golden pillars after roughly 2.2 seconds (2.55 charged); charging increases damage by 25%.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (per pillar):</font> 80 uncharged / 100 charged
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (per projectile):</font> 2
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Ancient Erdtree

name: Minor Erdtree
caption:
Secret incantation of Queen Marika.
Only the kindness of gold, without Order.

Marika bathed the village of her home in gold, knowing full well that there was no one to heal.
info:
Summon an illusory Minor Erdtree that heals allies over time within an expanding radius, draws enemy attention, damages Wraiths and Revenants, does not heal enemies standing beside the caster, and stacks with other healing zones.

<font color="#E0B985">Healing per tick:</font> 9 HP every 0.25 seconds for 30 seconds (1080 total)
<font color="#E0B985">Radius:</font> Expands from 0.3 to 3 meters
<font color="#E0B985">Damage vs Wraiths/Revenants:</font> (3% <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font>) + 10
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Ancient Erdtree

name: Land of Shadow
caption:
Incantation originating from Scadutree avatars.

This incantation channels the force of the Scadutree's power, and its gold is accompanied by shadow.
info:
Call down a hail of golden projectiles after a brief delay, letting the Scadutree's shadowed power rain down across foes.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Ancient Erdtree

name: Wrath from Afar
caption:
An Erdtree incantation discovered in the realm of shadow.

When the Elden Ring was shattered, the people of the realm of shadow felt it too-and feared it as a sign of the Erdtree's wrath.
info:
Release a golden shockwave that knocks foes down while dealing <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font>; charging increases its reach and stagger and it counts as a charged spell but is not affected by Godfrey Icon.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 100 uncharged / 120 charged
<font color="#E0B985">Radius:</font> 2 meters uncharged / 3 meters charged
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 10 uncharged / 15 charged
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Ancient Erdtree

name: Light of Miquella
caption:
The strength of Miquella upon his deific return, wielded as an incantation.

Miquella sought to accept all that was and would be, but found one that refused to be embraced.

No wonder, as one god, and one king consort, is all the world needs.
info:
Annihilate foes with a pillar of light that erupts roughly 2.5 seconds after casting, the main burst knocking down targets in a 6 meter radius while lesser pillars stagger enemies in 1 meter pockets even if the aura is interrupted.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (main pillar):</font> Incant Scaling x 3.75
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (lesser pillars):</font> Incant Scaling x 0.70
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 20 (main pillar) / 2 (lesser pillars)
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Miquellan

name: Multilayered Ring of Light
caption:
Incantation of those who served Miquella.

This light-ring incantation was cultivated by a tradition separate from Golden Order fundamentalism.
info:
Fire a multilayered ring of golden light that glides forward, dealing pure <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font>; charging increases its power but only one ring can exist at a time across all players.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (per hit):</font> 200 uncharged / 250 charged
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (initial hit):</font> 8 (10 charged)
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (follow-up hit):</font> 1.5
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Miquellan

name: Roar of Rugalea
caption:
An incantation of what is jokingly called "the bear communion."
Channels the power of Rugalea, the great red bear.

An incantation that is more akin to the divine invocation of the hornsent than it is to the Dragon Communion. Only through desperate battle with the feral wild can one discover a god unique to oneself.
info:
Transform into a great red bear and emit a furious roar; the uncharged version delivers a single impact, while a charged roar unleashes twelve lighter thrusts then a final heavy strike, and headshots can stagger even when cast on horseback.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (uncharged roar):</font> Incant Scaling x 1.10
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (charged roar):</font> 12 hits at Incant Scaling x 0.45 plus 1 hit at Incant Scaling x 1.62
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 14 uncharged / 42 charged
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Knight's Lightning Spear
caption:
One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

An incantation that was taught only to the most accomplished knights, and now a lost art in the Lands Between.
info:
Hurl a lightning spear while sigils erupt to fire two more shortly after, with follow-up bolts tracing the aim set by the first spear even if the cast is interrupted; water shockwaves can trigger twice to add extra <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> and 2 <font color="#C0B194">stance</font>, and the initial spear hits with +40% <font color="#E0B985">attack power</font> while the trailing bolts deal -20%.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (per projectile):</font> Incant Scaling x 1.38 uncharged / Incant Scaling x 1.64 charged
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (per projectile):</font> 5 (9 charged)
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (water shockwave):</font> Incant Scaling x 0.50
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Dragonbolt of Florissax
caption:
Special incantation of the ancient dragon Florissax.

There was a time when the priestess never knew love, and thus never used this incantation herself.
info:
Call down red lightning to surround the caster and nearby allies with a 7 meter aura for 70 seconds, increasing all damage negation and boosting guard damage negation after other shields; this is an aura buff that cannot be charged or stacked with other aura-type buffs.
Increase all damage negation by 10% for allies within the aura (5% in PvP) and increase guard damage negation by 20% after the base shield reduction.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Electrocharge
caption:
One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

The origin of incantations that bolster the body with lightning, and now a lost art in the Lands Between.
info:
Call down lightning to charge the caster's body, the strike dealing <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> before a body buff pulses <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> every 0.2 seconds in a 2.5 meter radius for 45 seconds while bypassing guarding and inflicting no <font color="#C0B194">stance</font> or <font color="#E0B985">poise</font> damage; charging increases the strike by 23%, the lingering pulses by 30%, and the stance of the initial hit.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (initial strike):</font> 213 uncharged / 262 charged
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (pulse):</font> 45 uncharged / 59 charged
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (initial strike):</font> 7 (10 charged)
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Bayle's Tyranny
caption:
One of the greatest Dragon Communion incantations.
Harnesses the fearsome power of Bayle the Dread.

Even after being consumed, the throbbing heart of Bayle continues to resist its subjugation, never weakening. One day, the fire within will consume the very body and soul of its Communion devourer. One day.
info:
Channel the dread dragon to roar with a heatwave burst of mostly <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> and some <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font>; the start-up bolt causes light stagger before the explosion knocks foes down, and it cannot be charged or cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (start-up bolt):</font> 50
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (start-up bolt):</font> 20
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosion):</font> 325
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (explosion):</font> 210
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 2 start-up lightning / 25 explosion
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Bayle's Flame Lightning
caption:
One of the greatest Dragon Communion incantations.
Harnesses the fearsome power of Bayle the Dread.

Even after being consumed, the throbbing heart of Bayle continues to resist its subjugation, never weakening. One day, the fire within will consume the very body and soul of its Communion devourer. One day.
info:
Channel the dread dragon to strike with a flame-lightning talon bone; direct hits deal mostly <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> and <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> that knock foes down, partial hits halve the damage and stance, and lingering flames deal minor flame <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> while adding 16 accumulation toward multi-hit boosts; cannot be charged or cast on horseback.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (direct hit):</font> 280
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (direct hit):</font> 220
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (direct hit):</font> 280
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (lingering flames):</font> 150
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (lingering flames):</font> 200
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 30 direct hit / 15 partial hit / 2 lingering flames
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Ghostflame Breath
caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

The land of spiritgraves is home to all manner of dead, and even the corpses of fallen dragons found their way there. Several of them were endowed with such vivacity that even in death, they could not fully die.
info:
Spew ghostflame breath from above after a two second wind-up, dealing <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> while inflicting <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite</font> accumulation; the breath can be extended to breathe again, swivelled mid-cast, and used while jumping but not on horseback in a roughly five second sequence.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (per hit):</font> 168
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (per hit):</font> 4
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (per hit):</font> 55
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Rotten Butterflies
caption:
Incantation used by Romina, Saint of the Bud.

The scarlet butterflies are as the Goddess of Rot's wings. Bereft of a master, they were soothed by Romina, who reached out to them.
info:
Summon countless butterflies that break apart on contact, overlapping explosions that detonate quickly and spread <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot</font>, building rot on anyone standing in the cloud while briefly granting immunity to grab attacks.

<font color="#EF7676">Scarlet Rot:</font> Inflicts 0.33% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> + 13 per second for 90 seconds (29.7% + 1170 total).

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 100 start-up / 100 per explosion
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 5 start-up / 3 per explosion
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation:</font> 80 per explosion
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot

name: Pest-Thread Spears
caption:
Skill of the pests known as the Kindred of Rot, now wielded as an incantation.

The pests are abandoned servants, and it is for this reason that they found a mother in the Saint of the Bud.
info:
Secrete sticky threads and twist them into two flying spears that pierce forward; charging increases their power, they hit every piece of geometry they pass through to punish large foes, draw no enemy attention, and do not trigger multi-hit bonuses.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> Incant Scaling x 1.80 uncharged / Incant Scaling x 2.30 charged
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (per hit):</font> 3 (4 charged)
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot

name: Midra's Flame of Frenzy
caption:
Incantation in praise of Midra, Lord of Frenzied Flame.

The Lord of Frenzied Flame shall take their torment, despair. Their affliction. Every sin, every curse. All melted away.
Yet Midra, like others before him, was too weak to become a Lord.
info:
Summon Midra's head to spew frenzied flame in roughly a 5 meter radius while the input is held, dealing <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> and building <font color="#EEAA2B">Madness</font> on foes and on the caster until <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> is depleted or madness triggers.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (per hit):</font> 75
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation (aura on enemies):</font> 10 at 2.5/s for 1 second (5 meter radius)
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation (aura on self):</font> 7 at 2.5/s for 1 second
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation (per projectile):</font> 30
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame

name: Watchful Spirit
caption:
An entreaty received from the Empyrean grandam.

"Take vengeance upon Messmer and his lot.
They who betrayed us, aye, they who burned us...
Let them face in thy wrath their just deserts."
info:
Summon a guardian Skull Spirit above the caster; after roughly six seconds it slows to a halt then fires volleys of four projectiles every few seconds while the caster first slows and then stops during the cast.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (projectile):</font> Incant Scaling x 1.0
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (projectile):</font> 5
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower Incantation

name: Golden Arcs
caption:
Sorcery of the inquisitors of the tower, wielded as an incantation of the spiral.

The arcs resemble barbs, a known symbol of coercive questioning.
info:
Swing the arm to release a procession of three golden arcs that race forward; charging extends their reach and power, and they can be fired in quick succession.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (per arc):</font> 80% of Incant Scaling uncharged / 95% when fully charged
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (per arc):</font> 5 (15 total)
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Giant Golden Arc
caption:
Sorcery of the inquisitors of the tower, wielded as an incantation of the spiral.

The arc resembles the barb, a known symbol of coercive questioning.
info:
Swing the arm to release a giant golden arc that tracks targets, pierces every enemy it touches, and keeps traveling through cramped corridors; charging increases its force and it can be cast in quick succession.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> Incant Scaling x 2.15 uncharged / Incant Scaling x 2.65 charged
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 8 (12 charged)
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Spira
caption:
Superior sorcery of the tower priests, wielded as an incantation of the spiral.

The spiral is a normalized Crucible current that, one day, will form a column that stretches to the gods.
info:
Wrap both arms together to draw a spiral of light beneath the target, rooting the caster while each burst erupts at the enemy's feet and retargets between bursts; hold the input to keep conjuring until <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> or <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font> runs dry, and walls block the columns.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (per spiral):</font> Incant Scaling x 1.60
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (per spiral):</font> 3
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Divine Beast Tornado
caption:
The tempest of the Dancing Lion, wielded as an incantation.

The majority of divine beasts were gored and hung upon Messmer's spears, then burned in his flame. Those who witnessed the deed likened it to a funeral pyre for the tower itself.
info:
Twist the body like a whirlwind to call a storm around the caster, staggering nearby foes with the opening gust before driving a tornado forward; charging increases damage and launches targets upward, casting on horseback halts Torrent, and the incantation is not boosted by the Spiraltree Seal.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (tornado):</font> 220
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (tornado, charged):</font> 275
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (start-up gust):</font> 3
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (tornado):</font> 8
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Divine Bird Feathers
caption:
A technique of the divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, wielded as an incantation.

The divine bird warriors, and indeed this technique, are said to bear resemblance to the golden Crucible.
info:
Spread both arms like wings to scatter razor feathers while moving, steering the volley on foot or horseback; holding the input releases continuous volleys. Not boosted by the Spiraltree Seal.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (per feather):</font> 42
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (per feather):</font> 1
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Fire Serpent
caption:
Incantation of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command.

When the flame they received from Messmer would not find purchase within them, the Fire Knights relied on fire incantations to honor their bond.
info:
Launch a serpentine flame that lingers briefly before curling toward the nearest foe, bursting instantly at point-blank range and favoring short-range duels; without a lock-on it fires at the nearest onscreen enemy or, if none, toward the ground to the left.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> Incant Scaling x 1.68
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> Incant Scaling x 2.10
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage:</font> 6
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (charged):</font> 8
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Messmer's Flame

name: Rain of Fire
caption:
Incantation of Salza, sage of the Fire Knights.

Salza's disdain for barbarism never waned, even as he burned more villages and scorched more land than any other.
info:
Summon a cloud of flame overhead that pelts foes for roughly four seconds, landing 10-20 hits across a medium-long area; charging amplifies the storm, it shares its stance with Fire's Deadly Sin, and it manifests directly above the caster if no lock-on exists.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (per projectile):</font> Incant Scaling x 0.52
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (per projectile, charged):</font> Incant Scaling x 0.63
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (per hit):</font> 1.5
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Messmer's Flame

name: Messmer's Orb
caption:
An incantation of Messmer the Impaler.

Messmer despised his own fire. Time and time again he hoped to rid himself of it, but ever did it burn.
info:
Shape Messmer's flame into a floating orb that hurtles forward, dealing a contact hit before burrowing for a delayed explosion that knocks foes down; the cast has no hyper armor, the explosion spans about 4 meters uncharged or 6 meters charged, and charging extends its travel distance and power.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (contact):</font> Incant Scaling x 0.50
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosion):</font> Incant Scaling x 3.08
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (contact, charged):</font> Incant Scaling x 0.70
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosion, charged):</font> Incant Scaling x 4.11
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (contact):</font> 4+4
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (explosion):</font> 25
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (contact, charged):</font> 4+4
<font color="#C0B194">Base stance damage (explosion, charged):</font> 35
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Messmer's Flame
